note: COMT Val158Met (Met lowers COMT activity → higher catecholamines, slower E2 methylation).
UGT1A1 *28 tag (reduced glucuronidation → slower E2 clearance).
CYP3A5*3 (non-expressor; shifts clearance burden to CYP3A4).
CYP19A1 intronic (strong LD with E2 variation).
C677T reduces MTHFR activity; AA ~30% function; folate-responsive homocysteine.
Milder activity drop; compound with C677T increases effect.
Together with rs429358 defines APOE ε2/3/4.
